price: Na ishara ngapi katika mbingu na ardhi wanazo zipitia, na hali ya kuwa wanazipuuza.
arabic: وَكَأَيِّن مِّنۡ ءَايَةٖ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ يَمُرُّونَ عَلَيۡهَا وَهُمۡ عَنۡهَا مُعۡرِضُونَ
footnotes: Na dalili ni nyingi mno za kuonyesha kuwepo Muumba, na Upweke wake, na Ukamilifu wake, ziliomo katika mbingu na ardhi, ambazo wanaziona watu wako, na wanazipuuza kwa inda, hawataki kuzizingatia.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: waka-ayyin min āyatin fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi yamurrūna ʿalayhā wahum ʿanhā muʿ'riḍūna
